item.title: Half of districts don't have have a full time technology director
item.description:
Many Districts Go Without a Chief Tech Officer

Even as schools juggle a daunting array of evolving technological demands, federal data show that roughly half of districts do not have a full-time chief technology officer or technology manager whose sole job is to oversee all digital needs. Those needs include â€¦
item.dc:creator: mr.rcollins
